info.title: CBMIA B2C APIs for Clarisonic
info.description:
General Guidelines 
1. DO NOT USE "sandbox" in path while invoking API from actual application Or from any other test clients

2. OAuth tokens should be cached by client application for the duration indicated in the token response

Available Environments
1. DEV : apidev.lorealcloud.com
2. QA  : apiqa.lorealcloud.com
3. PROD: api.lorealcloud.com

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: ***token from auth call sent as Bearer*** This is only used in case of mobile authorization

externalCustomerId.description: Customer ID of the source system which is used as the master ID.  This field is mandatory for certain brands

displayName.description: Display Name of the customer which the member would like to be greeted.

prefix.description: Display Name of the customer which the member would like to be greeted.

firstName.description: Display Name of the customer which the member would like to be greeted.

socialUid.description: This is a mandatory value when enrollment type = social. Eg: when the user enrollâ€™ s using Facebook as the primary social provider, then socialUID is "24235235345"

email.description: Email ID of the customer used during member enrollment

mobilePhone.description: Phone number of the customer used during enrollment/registration

brand.description: Brand associated with the customer for which they are being registered. This is a mandatory value which is standard 3 characters to define all the Lâ€™OrÃ©al Brands uniquely.

enrollmentType.description: Enrollment type used during the customer registration process Possible values are; email,social

primarySocialProvider.description: This is mandatory when enrollment type is "social". Example values are â€¢  facebook â€¢  twitter â€¢  instagram â€¢  pinterest

enrolledAt.description: This is mandatory for the source systems for registration where dateTime in ISO-8601 format used during customer registration.

expirationDate.description: Expiration of the customer status (if any)

status.description: Status of the customer Example values active inactive

profileUrl.description: Profile URL of the customer which contains the display image of the customer

region.description: Region of the program to which the customer registration is used. This should be the standard 3 character ISO country code. Example values; USA CAN

channel.description: Engagement channel Example values; web mobile instore

subChannel.description: Additional details about the channel, such as store ID, store location, website section etc.

subChannelDetail.description: additional details about the sub_channel, such as Sales Rep or Employee ID Number

customData.description: Custom attribute which can be used store log texts.

customAttribute.description: Custom attribute which can be used store log texts.

sourceSystem.description: Source system of the calling application. Example values; Demandware

createdBy.description: This is audit column. It stores the created by information of the source system

createdOn.description: This is audit column. It stores the created at timestamp information of the source system. This should be in  ISO-8601 format

customerId.description: Customer ID created after registering the customer.

externalCustomerId.description: Customer ID of the source system which is used as the master ID.This field is mandatory for certain brands

email.description: Email ID of the customer used during member enrollment
